modName: Imperial Heavy Helmet Armor Type Fix
summary: Makes the heavy Imperial Helmet actually be recognised as such.
descriptionHtml:
Description
===========
I noticed that the heavy Imperial Helmet (pictured) wasn\'t giving me the full-suit bonus for heavy armour. A quick look in the CK showed it as having the keyword \"ArmorLight\" instead of \"ArmorHeavy\" like it probably should, being as it\'s in the heavy set. This .esp rectifies that error.

Installation
===========
Just drag and drop the .esp into your ...\\Skyrim\\Data\\ folder and activate it on whatever mod manager you use.
author: Facte
